credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
title: Sampler
provenance:
By 1941, Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
1941, Museum for the Arts of Decoration of the Cooper Union
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, satin, and stem stitches on plain weave foundation
description:
Bands of alphabets and numerals with geometric cross borders, and an inscription. 
In the lower half, baskets of flowering vines and birds fill the field. With a black and white diamond border.
name: Sampler
